001package io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.select;
002
003import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.selenium.smart.SmartWebElement;
004import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.util.strategy.Strategy;
005import java.util.List;
006import org.openqa.selenium.By;
007
008/**
009 * Represents a selectable component, typically an HTML 'select' or similar UI element
010 * that supports selecting multiple options. Provides methods to select options by text
011 * or strategy, retrieve available or selected options, and check visibility or enabled states.
012 *
013 * <p>Implementations commonly rely on Selenium-based operations using container elements
014 * ({@link SmartWebElement}) or locators ({@link By}). This interface standardizes how
015 * select widgets are handled, regardless of the underlying framework or implementation.
016 *
017 * <p>Usage ranges from simple dropdown selects to more complex multi-select scenarios.
018 * The {@code selectOptions()} methods allow specifying multiple values or applying a
019 * {@link Strategy} for custom selection logic.
020 *
021 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
022 */
023public interface Select {
024
025   /**
026    * Selects one or more options, identified by their display text or value,
027    * within the specified container.
028    *
029    * @param container the container holding the select component.
030    * @param values    one or more option texts or values to be selected.
031    */
032   void selectOptions(SmartWebElement container, String... values);
033
034   /**
035    * Selects one or more options, identified by their display text or value,
036    * within the container located by the given locator.
037    *
038    * @param containerLocator the locator referencing the container.
039    * @param values           one or more option texts or values to be selected.
040    */
041   void selectOptions(By containerLocator, String... values);
042
043   /**
044    * Selects one or more options based on a custom {@link Strategy}, returning the texts
045    * of the selected options.
046    *
047    * @param container the container holding the select component.
048    * @param strategy  the selection strategy determining which options to select.
049    * @return a list of texts representing the newly selected options.
050    */
051   List<String> selectOptions(SmartWebElement container, Strategy strategy);
052
053   /**
054    * Selects one or more options, determined by a custom {@link Strategy}, within the container
055    * located by the given locator.
056    *
057    * @param containerLocator the locator referencing the container.
058    * @param strategy         the selection strategy determining which options to select.
059    * @return a list of texts representing the newly selected options.
060    */
061   List<String> selectOptions(By containerLocator, Strategy strategy);
062
063   /**
064    * Retrieves all available option texts within the specified container.
065    *
066    * @param container the container holding the select component.
067    * @return a list of strings representing the available options.
068    */
069   List<String> getAvailableOptions(SmartWebElement container);
070
071   /**
072    * Retrieves all available option texts within the container located by the given locator.
073    *
074    * @param containerLocator the locator referencing the container.
075    * @return a list of strings representing the available options.
076    */
077   List<String> getAvailableOptions(By containerLocator);
078
079   /**
080    * Retrieves all currently selected option texts within the specified container.
081    *
082    * @param container the container holding the select component.
083    * @return a list of strings representing the selected options.
084    */
085   List<String> getSelectedOptions(SmartWebElement container);
086
087   /**
088    * Retrieves all currently selected option texts within the container located by the given locator.
089    *
090    * @param containerLocator the locator referencing the container.
091    * @return a list of strings representing the selected options.
092    */
093   List<String> getSelectedOptions(By containerLocator);
094
095   /**
096    * Checks if a specific option is visible, identified by display text or value, within the given container.
097    *
098    * @param container the container holding the select component.
099    * @param value     the text or value identifying the option.
100    * @return true if the option is visible, otherwise false.
101    */
102   boolean isOptionVisible(SmartWebElement container, String value);
103
104   /**
105    * Checks if a specific option is visible within the container located by the given locator.
106    *
107    * @param containerLocator the locator referencing the container.
108    * @param value            the text or value identifying the option.
109    * @return true if the option is visible, otherwise false.
110    */
111   boolean isOptionVisible(By containerLocator, String value);
112
113   /**
114    * Checks if a specific option is enabled, identified by display text or value,
115    * within the given container.
116    *
117    * @param container the container holding the select component.
118    * @param value     the text or value identifying the option.
119    * @return true if the option is enabled, otherwise false.
120    */
121   boolean isOptionEnabled(SmartWebElement container, String value);
122
123   /**
124    * Checks if a specific option is enabled within the container located by the given locator.
125    *
126    * @param containerLocator the locator referencing the container.
127    * @param value            the text or value identifying the option.
128    * @return true if the option is enabled, otherwise false.
129    */
130   boolean isOptionEnabled(By containerLocator, String value);
131
132}
